data.text:
Harry Grant Shearer was born on 2 October 1867, in Centre, Pennsylvania, United States. He married Sarah Lavinia or Levina Heffner on 31 March 1889, in Bedford, Pennsylvania, United States. They were the parents of at least 6 sons and 1 daughter. He lived in Duquesne, Allegheny, Pennsylvania, United States in 1900 and Harrisburg, Dauphin, Pennsylvania, United States in 1920. He died on 2 May 1935, in Donora, Washington, Pennsylvania, United States, at the age of 67, and was buried in Saxton, Bedford, Pennsylvania, United States.
